ATTACH_FILE_DIALOG.TITLE: Select a file
ATTACH_FILE_DIALOG.FOLDER_NAME_DOES_NOT_EXIST: Folder {{folderName}} does not exist. The file cannot be uploaded.
ATTACH_FILE_DIALOG.FOLDER_DOES_NOT_EXIST: The folder to upload the file to does not exist. The file cannot be uploaded.
ATTACH_FILE_DIALOG.CONTENT_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE: The content service is temporarily unavailable. The file cannot be uploaded.
ATTACH_FILE_DIALOG.FOLDER_ACCESS_DENIED: You don't have permissions to the specified folder in content repository.
